speaker: Baiju
title: On-device Training with ONNX Runtime
description:
In this episode we will dive into how to train machine learning models on a device. On-Device Training refers to the process of training a machine learning model on an edge device, such as mobile phones, embedded devices, gaming consoles, web browsers, etc.
